attributes.action: Ban Nigel Farage from taking part in Brexit negotiations with the EU
attributes.background: Nigel Farage is an elected MEP at the European Parliament but he is not an elected MP in the UK Parliament. Therefore he should not be permitted to take part in any brexit negotiations on behalf of the UK government other than what is allowed under the remit of the role of an MEP.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or not given a job.
